channel.title: Making an NPC sell membership
channel.description:
Ok, most people are complaining on my server that they cant do anything because of non membership.. [b]MY SOURCE IS DEVO 7.0[/b]
Ok .. i was wondering if someone coud tell me or send tut url .. so an npc sells premium for like 50m..
Please help :)

item.title: Making an NPC sell membership
item.dc:creator: @angel_in_war angel in war
item.description:
@angel_in_war wrote:

Lol easy
spawn a npc(using autospawn.cfg)
edit the shops(using shops.cfg to make him a shop)
get an item (with somthing other then use) // i recomment item Ground bat bones ID = 2391
and use this code

case XX: // you can easily know what number by right click playerismember = 1; // use isMember or whatever at ur source... disconnect = true; // so the player disconnect and save the file archive.. break; // to end the case...

++Rep me if it work

if you don’t know how to spawn and make shop your just a leecher

Read full topic
